person4.name: Marc Garreau
person4.bio: Marc joined the Ethereum Foundation in 2017, first with the Mist Browser team to improve application performance and state management. He specializes in front-end application architecture and technical writing, authoring Redux in Action, published in 2018.

person5.name: Everton Fraga
person5.bio: Automation geek that loves to solve problems

person6.name: Ryan Ghods
person6.bio: Ryan works on the Grid team creating a tooling platform for various Ethereum projects in the ecosystem. He also co-authored EIP 1193 to create a long-lasting Ethereum JavaScript Provider API that dapps can rely on.

person7.name: philipplgh
person7.bio: Philipp joined the Ethereum Foundation in 2018 with a focus on Wallet security and browser technologies. He is now working on Ethereum Grid and author of Ethereum Signed Packages.
